- 문제 페이지: 122
- 풀이 페이지: 274

## Command

```sh
javac -Xlint -d ./Java/classes ./Java/CtCILibrary/CtCILibrary/*.java ./Java/Ch\ 04.\ Trees\ and\ Graphs/Q4_09_BST_Sequences/*.java

java -cp ./Java/classes Q4_09_BST_Sequences.Question
```

```sh
javac -Xlint -d ./Java/classes ./Java/Ch\ 04.\ Trees\ and\ Graphs/Q4_09_BST_Sequences/ghojeong/*.java

java -cp ./Java/classes Q4_09_BST_Sequences.ghojeong.Question
```

## 해설

### 예제 1

```txt
       110
      / \
     /   \
    /     \
   /       \
   100       150
  /       / \
 /       /   \
 50       120   170
/ \
20 75
```

경우의 수 = 140

```txt
node50 = 2C1 = 2
node100 = 3C3 * node50 = 1 * 2 = 2
150: 2C1 = 2
node110 = 7C3 * node100 * node150 = 35 * 2 * 2 = 140
```

### 예제 2

```txt
       11
      / \
     /   \
    /     \
   /       \
   7       15
  / \
 /   \
 5    9
/ \   / \
2 6   8  10
```

경우의 수 = 160

```txt
node5 = 2C1 = 2
node9 = 2C1 = 2
node7 = 6C3 * node5 * node9 = 5 * 2 * 2 = 20
node11 = 8C1 * node7 * node15 = 8 * 20 * 1 = 160
```
